about_the_game:
________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Powered by Unreal Engine Beast Fists features unique 3d fighting experience with innovative mechanics, visuals and music.
Intuitive controls, realistic martial arts styles, heavy hits, reactive blocking, ducking, dodging and counter attacks should bring you a lot of fun and enjoyment from the gameplay.
Free updates will be coming frequently.
Beast Fists currently is all about arena fighting, but with time will be evolved to something much bigger.


________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Beast Fists is a fighting game set in a dystopian world of anthropomorphic creatures fighting to keep their freedom from an increasingly controlling and vicious kingdom regime, ruled by fear.

Beast World is ruled by fear and authoritarian classes of the Kingdom. The main Beasts are those, who don’t agree with or are forced to face the Authority. However, some of the Beasts are the guards and enforcers of the regime, ready to squash the resistance. Which side will you choose? Which Beast will prevail in the end?

Beast Fists strives to achieve a Golden Balance between fantasy and reality, both in story and gaming style. There will be realistic fighting VFX in combination with exaggerated Super Moves, both balanced to a satisfying gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-3770 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Equivalent. 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-8700 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Equivalent. 8GB VRAM
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
